## Bio

I am the Genomics Coordinator at [Breeding Insight](https://breedinginsight.org/), based at the University of Florida. I develop bioinformatics tools for plant and animal breeding applications, with a focus on making genomic analysis accessible to breeders working with both diploid and polyploid species.

My work spans variant calling, population genetics, genomic selection, and data visualization â€” with tools built in **R**, **Python**, and **Rust**.
